overview: High school senior Morgan's older sister and good friends, Jackie, Vic, and Tiff, comfort her when her senior picture day takes a turn for the worse thanks to an old elementary besty and current rival, Maria Sanchez. After successfully seeing through the perfect plot for revenge, the four young ladies find a lucrative business venture to be made of what was supposed to be a one-time payback to put Maria in her place. Things are going great until their endeavors lead them barking up the wrong tree â€“ only in this case, the tree bites back.
title: Bundles
